verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I surrender to Jesus
my Lord,
all my wealth and
all my life.
I surrender to Jesus
my Lord,
all my wealth and
all my life. x4

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I surrender, surrender all.
I surrender, surrender all.
I surrender to Jesus
my Lord. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Into my heart,
be welcome, be welcome.
Into my heart,
be welcome, be welcome.
(Into my heart). x3
Enter today.
